name: nchart
description: nChart for node.js inspired by Chart.js.
readme:
nchart
======

nChart for node.js inspired by [Chart.js][].

```js
var Canvas = require('canvas')
  , canvas = new Canvas(800, 800)
  , ctx = canvas.getContext('2d')
  , Chart = require('nchart')
  , fs = require('fs');

Chart(ctx).Pie(
    [
        {
            "value": 50
          , "color": "#E2EAE9"
        }
      , {
            "value": 100
          , "color": "#D4CCC5"
        }
      , {
            "value": 40
          , "color": "#949FB1"
        }
    ]
  , {
        scaleShowValues: true
      , scaleFontSize: 24
    }
);

canvas.toBuffer(function (err, buf) {
  if (err) throw err;
  fs.writeFile(__dirname + '/pie.png', buf);
});
```

## Installation

    $ npm install -g nchart

## Features

  * Built on [node-canvas][]

## Charts

  * [✔] Line chart
  * [✔] Pie chart
  * [✔] Doughnut chart
  * [✔] Bar chart
  * [✔] Radar chart
  * [✔] Polar area chart

## Documentation

  You can find documentation at [Chart.js Doc][]
